_sText:
bhop_challenge2 - Created by Slasher

General Information:

-This Map DOESN'T include MpBhops
-1 Bonus; 1 End Room; many other Stages with many different looks;
 "Isle Stage" after the End Room
-Length: Mid
-Skill: Mid-High
-HDR used

Don't flame about no MpBhop's taken. I never have used it, and i also won't do it in the future.

There aren't teleporters in every stage, it has a reason. Don't ask for it. ;p
  
Special Thanks to:
 
 -Serenity Surf Clan
 -Beta Testers (Especially ChaoZ, Crystal)
 -& all who helped me with fixing bugs and other things (Solidsurf)


Credits for Textures/Models:

Cell Shaded Christmas Models - By Lost:
http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/4209

Digital Numbers - by P3TR05:
http://www.fpsbanana.com/textures/2478

Waterfall Textures - by TopHATTwaffle:
http://www.fpsbanana.com/textures/2665

Halo Texture Mega-Pack - Uploaded by [-B-]:
http://www.fpsbanana.com/textures/2327

Gecko Textures - by Nubblecakes:
http://www.fpsbanana.com/textures/1653

Some Textures are also taken from the gg_immortal Texture Pack - by JackTheStripper

Pillar Models in the Tomb Theme by BlackSheep

Skybox - by [-B-]

If i forgott someone, PM me or say it here. I'll add you.

So, have fun, leave a nice Comment & Rate good.

PS: Offline Servers may Crash by killing yourself. Online Servers may crash by doing a round restart, i don't care. (;
Why? This map has just been released now couse i'm tired of mapping, but all in one it doesn't hurt the gameplay, does it? :p
